text: Chesney Lee Hawkes (born 22 September 1971) is an English singer, musician and actor. He was born in Windsor, Berkshire. He had a hit record "The One and Only". It was number 1 for five weeks in 1991. He starred in the movie Buddy's Song along with Roger Daltrey. == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Berkshire Category:English guitarists Category:English pop singers Category:Musicians from Berkshire Category:Windsor, Berkshire
title: Chesney Hawkes
